print.title: You can print to PDF, the buttons and overlay will be removed automagically

about.title: ABOUT
about.text:
I am a passionate fullstack developer, specializing in frontend UI/UX development, with a strong background in designing and implementing APIs, backend development, as well as integrating complex systems.
I enjoy crafting technological solutions that provide exceptional user experiences.
Additionally, I am proficient in collaborating with backend teams to seamlessly integrate user interfaces with backend functionalities.
My ability to grasp user needs and translate them into efficient technical solutions makes me a valuable asset for any web development project.
I am also familiar with Agile methodologies such as SCRUM and KANBAN, enabling me to work collaboratively and efficiently.

items.languages: Languages: HTML5, CSS3, SASS, JavaScript, ReactJS, Thymeleaf, Java
items.tools: Tools: IntelliJ, Visual Studio Code, PSQL, MySQL, PostMan, Docker, Figma, Framer
items.others: Others: Development best practices, technology watch, naming conventions, Micro-feature work.

experiences.description: I developed an API for a connected cash register, ensuring compatibility with current and future systems through the hexagonal architecture. Implemented in JAVA 11, this approach prioritized robustness, maintainability, and scalability. Additionally, I optimized the frontend in ReactJS, enhancing performance by minimizing file size and resource usage.
Taking on the role of integrator and Frontend developer in 2 incubation projects:

projects.name: My-UUU
projects.description: In a team of five, I contributed as a Frontend/Integrator to a website facilitating equestrian center registration and user search based on specific criteria. I focused on UI/UX enhancements, integrating APIs in ReactJS, converting mockups into functional pages.

projects.name: My-Actividay
projects.description: In a team of six, I served as a Frontend/Integrator for a web app providing CRA creation services to micro-enterprises and SMEs. I focused on UI/UX improvements, including mockup conversion to functional pages, SCSS animations, and project structuring using xHTML5 and Thymeleaf.

more.title: MORE ABOUT ME
more.text: In my spare time, I am actively involved in creating small projects. Notably, I developed the website for Plastic Vortex, an organization dedicated to protecting river and ocean ecosystems by mitigating plastic pollution. I have a strong appetite for learning and am constantly exploring new topics and technologies to expand my skills and knowledge.
